Projects

Projects (9)
Floral resources for urban pollinators
Project
To measure nectar supply in gardens and other urban land uses, allowing comparisons with rural habitats and evidence-based management recommendations for supporting urban pollinator conservation.
View
Multi-species pollination interactions in a Kenyan savannah ecosystem
Project
During my PhD I studied daily temporal variation in plant-pollinator communities in a savannah ecosystem in Kenya.
View
Urban Pollinators Project
Project
A four-year research collaboration between the Universities of Bristol, Reading, Leeds and Edinburgh that examined urban pollinators in the UK. The project set out to address the following questions: 1. How does the pollinator biodiversity in urban areas compare to that of nature reserves and farmland? 2. Where are the hot-spots of pollinator biodiversity in urban areas? 3. What can we do to improve pollinator diversity and abundance in urban areas?
